name: AMBO
description: An open-world gaming universe, where NFTs spring to life through N2L and our Gen-S Battleground. Our games are safeguarded by AI-empowered NPCs, ensuring a fun, secure environment. At Sheertopia, we empower gamers, giving them a voice in shaping our games through community votes on updates and developments. We're not just creating games; we're crafting experiences, built by gamers, for gamers
